description: The New York Times Best Sellers are up-to-date and authoritative lists of the most popular books in the United States, based on sales in the past week, including fiction, non-fiction, paperbacks, children’s books, audiobooks, graphic books and more.
title: Children’s Picture Books
title_page: Children’s Picture Books - Best Sellers - Books - Feb. 9, 2020
maintext: If a book is not in a rank since the previous week , it will not have an arrow. The last few titles on the list known as the extended list, never have arrows.
